product_name: Custom Correct Custom Correct Mount Skokomish - Lake Cushman Map
long_description: Topographic trail map of Mount Skokomish Wilderness, North and South Skokomish River trails, and the Lake Cushman Area. Folds out to 22.5 x 14.5 inches; 3 black-and-white photos on back. Little River Enterprises; copyright 1998. No more piecing quads together: this Custom Correct(R) Map includes entire trail systems with no compromise in map size or scale. Virtually every trail has been carefully field checked, measured, and re-mapped more accurately than ever before. Accurate distances in miles and km, true woodland shading, and up-to-date roads, road numbers, names, and boundaries.
short_description: Topographic trail map of Mount Skokomish Wilderness, North and South Skokomish River trails, and the Lake Cushman Area.
